comment.author: 77318933@N08
comment._content: Usually when we read about WWI history, we almost hear of German generals like Ludendorff, Hindenberg, and Falkenhayn. I don't recall hearing of Reckowski!

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Otto Gynz von Rekowski (not "Reckowski") commander of the 39. infantry division, died Nov. 2 1915 see de.metapedia.org/wiki/Rekowski,_Otto_Gynz_von www.rekowski-familienverband.de/General_vRekowski.pdf

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you B-59 for the link that shows the correct spelling of the name. We'll correct the record the next time we update.
